About Me

A little bit about me...

BIO

I am endlessly fascinated by learning new things and how they work and then teaching others what I have learned

Kenzie Academy

Student Coach

Provided appropriate student support for the new students. Mainly tutored new students on HTML, CSS , Javascript and React/ Redux. Graded students submitted assessments and provided feedback on areas of improvement.

City of Leesburg

Finance-Utilities Specialist

Worked with city residents to understand needs and set up, maintain or cancel, Electric, Water and Gas services for their homes. Assisted in the maintenance of the City website specifically the Customer Service portal. .

Orange County Public Schools

Operator- Emergency Management

Compiled operational and production data into daily logs. Built and strengthened relationships with area governments, departments and agencies to manage effective planning and implementation of emergency response strategies.
